title: Naveena Path
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Sri Lankan, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Tamil restaurant serving around 70% vegan and vegetarian dishes, clearly marked as such. Most dishes can be prepared vegan upon request.
